trans-unit.source: Represents a state in a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar ett tillstånd i en <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateActivity represents a State in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]StateActivity representerar ett tillstånd i <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: State activities could contain one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, or StateActivity classes, one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> class, and one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: Tillstånd aktiviteter kan innehålla en eller flera <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, eller StateActivity klasser, en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>klass, och en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity>klass.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: SetState activities are used inside an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> to move the state of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: SetState aktiviteter används i en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>och <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>Flytta tillståndet för arbetsflödet.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>

trans-unit.source: When a StateActivity is executing, the only events that can be received are the events that can be handled by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities in the StateActivity and also the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities attached to the enclosing StateActivity activities and the root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: När en StateActivity körs är endast händelser som kan tas emot händelser som kan hanteras av <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>aktiviteter i StateActivity och även de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>aktiviteter som är kopplade till de omslutande StateActivity aktiviteterna och roten <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the StateActivity starts running, the StateActivity will check to see whether a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present or not.
trans-unit.target: När de StateActivity startar, StateActivity ska kontrollera om en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>aktivitet finns eller inte.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity can have zero or one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: StateActivity kan ha noll eller ett <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>aktivitet.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> will be executed.
trans-unit.target: Om en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>aktivitet finns i <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>kommer att utföras.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: As soon as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity finishes, the StateActivity blocks events so that the StateActivity only receives events that can be handled by its <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities.
trans-unit.target: Så snart den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>aktiviteten är klar StateActivity block händelser så att StateActivity får endast händelser som kan hanteras av dess <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>aktiviteter.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the StateActivity activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: StateActivity är en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, vilket innebär att aktiviteten StateActivity kan innehålla andra aktiviteter.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> klassen med namnet på aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Användardefinierad namnet på aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the execution of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter körningen av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: Körningskontexten för aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Den aktuella statusen för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> i arbetsflödesinstansen körs.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kör den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: Körningskontexten för aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Den aktuella statusen för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> i arbetsflödesinstansen körs.

trans-unit.source: Gets the executing instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that corresponds to the specified child activity name.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den verkställande instansen av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som motsvarar namnet på angivna underordnade aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
trans-unit.target: Den underordnade aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The dynamic child activities.
trans-unit.target: Dynamiska underordnade aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the childActivityName.
trans-unit.target: De körbara aktiviteterna innehåller inte den childActivityName .

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the service provider.
trans-unit.target: Initierar den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> med tjänstleverantören.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: Service provider för hämtning av tjänster.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the activity being added is an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> and if so, verifies whether the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: Anger om aktiviteten som läggs till är en <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> och i så fall, verifierar om händelsen nytillagda drivs behöver ska prenumerera på.

trans-unit.source: This is method is called whenever a user adds a child to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> through workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Detta är att metoden anropas när en användare lägger till en underordnad till en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>via ändringar av arbetsflödet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is defined in CompositeActivity and overridden by the StateActivity, where it checks whether the activity being added is an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> and if so, verifies if the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: Observera att den här metoden är definierad i CompositeActivity och åsidosätts av StateActivity, där kontrollerar den om aktiviteten som läggs till är en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>och i så fall, verifierar om händelsen nytillagda drivs behöver ska prenumerera på.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: Körningskontexten för aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The activity added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aktiviteten som lagts till i den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine as part of the activity's transition to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: Anropas av workflow runtime engine som en del av aktivitetens övergången till det <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: Service provider för hämtning av tjänster.

trans-unit.source: Holds the string value of the change tracking data key; "StateActivity.StateChange".
trans-unit.target: Innehåller strängvärdet för ändringsspårning datanyckel; "StateActivity.StateChange".

trans-unit.source: This field is a constant.
trans-unit.target: Det här fältet är en konstant.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.
